orego.heuristic

Class Heuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.heuristic.Heuristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CaptureHeuristic, DynamicPatternHeuristic, EscapeHeuristic, LearnedPatternHeuristic, PatternHeuristic, SpecificPointHeuristic

    public abstract class Heuristic
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Adjusts the probability of playing a move using domain-specific knowledge.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Board board)
        Called before any calls to evaluate on a given board state. For some heuristics, this avoids redundant computation. Overriding versions should usually call this version first, as it clears out goodMoves.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(String property,
               String value)
                 throws UnknownPropertyException
        Allows external clients to optimize parameters. Subclasses should override if they have additional 'tunable' parameters.
        Parameters:
        property - The name of the property
        value - The value of the property
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException
